title: The Little Prince
plot: A brave girl discovers the timeless tale of the Little Prince, blurring the line between imagination and reality.

title: Song of the Sea
plot: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

title: Your Lie in April
plot: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.

title: Wolfwalkers
plot: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

title: 3 Idiots
plot: Three friends reunite and revisit the wild journey that taught them to follow their hearts instead of convention.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
plot: Hazel and Gus are teenagers who meet at a cancer support group and fall in love. They both share the same acerbic wit and a love of books, especially "An Imperial Affliction", so they embark on a journey to visit an author in Amsterdam.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: Transcendence
plot: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence takes on dangerous implications when his own consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.
